entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
